spec_data.Name: texlive-lm-math
spec_data.Description:
Latin Modern Math is a maths companion for the Latin Modern
family of fonts, in OpenType format. For use with LuaLaTeX or
XeLaTeX, support is available from the unicode-math package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:20:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: OpenType maths fonts for Latin Modern
